Name: maximize_team_velocity
Description: Maximize the average story points completed per sprint by a team

Name: maximize_project_budget_utilization
Description: Maximize the percentage of budget used for high-priority features

Name: maximize_sprint_goal_achievement
Description: Maximize the number of sprint goals fully achieved

Name: minimize_blocker_severity
Description: Minimize the average severity of blockers during a sprint

Name: maximize_stakeholder_satisfaction
Description: Maximize the number of stakeholders with high satisfaction in sprint reviews

Name: maximize_feature_completion
Description: Maximize the number of features completed per release

Name: minimize_sprint_overrun
Description: Minimize the number of sprints that exceed their planned end date

Name: maximize_worker_availability
Description: Maximize the average availability of workers in a team

Name: maximize_user_story_completion
Description: Maximize the number of user stories completed per sprint

Name: minimize_task_effort_overrun
Description: Minimize the total effort overrun for tasks in a sprint

Name: maximize_epic_priority_completion
Description: Maximize the number of high-priority epics completed

Name: maximize_velocity_trend
Description: Maximize the positive trend in team velocity over time
